title: CTD plotter

output: html_document
runtime: shiny
---

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(oce)
dir <- "~/data/arctic/beaufort/2012"
files <- list.files(dir, ".cnv")
selectInput(inputId="file", label=sprintf("Select CNV file within %s", dir), choices=files)
renderPlot(
    {
        d <- read.oce(paste0(dir, "/", input$file))
        plot(d)
    }, height=600, pointsize=18)
```
